modName: New Fruit for Realistic Needs and Diseases
summary: Adds new types of fruit for Realistic Needs and Diseases
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new types of fruit for Realistic Needs and Diseases.  They are broken down into three categories...

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Types of Fruit[/b][/size][/color]

[b][u][color=#6fa8dc]Local Fruit[/color]
[/u][/b]
These are grown within Skyrim and are the same price as the apples you can already find in the game (3 gold).

[list]
[*]Grapes
[*]Pears
[*]Strawberries
[/list]
[color=#6fa8dc][b][u]Imported Fruit[/u][/b][/color]

These are imported from Cyrodiil and other nearby provinces.  They are a little more expensive than local
fruit (4 gold per portion*).

[list]
[*]Cherries
[*]Grapefruits
[*]Oranges
[*]Peaches
[*]Plums
[/list]
[color=#6fa8dc][u][b]Exotic Fruit[/b][/u][/color]

These are imported from Elsweyr and other far off provinces and are the most expensive (5 gold per portion*).

[list]
[*]Bananas
[*]Kiwi Fruit
[*]Mangos
[*]Melons
[*]Papaya
[*]Pineapple
[*]Watermelons
[/list]
*Grapefruits, Melons, Papaya, Pineapple and Watermelon have more than one portion.  Once you have eaten the fruit, the remaining portion/s will be added to your inventory.

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Availability[/b][/size][/color]

The new types of fruit can be found at the following vendors...

[color=#6fa8dc][u][b]Taverns[/b][/u][/color]

Skyrim taverns don't really care for fancy foreign food, so they will have a chance of stocking local fruit only.  Any other vendor that uses the [i]'LItemFoodInnCommon'[/i] leveled list will also have a chance of selling local fruit.

[color=#6fa8dc][b][u]Marise Arivel (Riften)[/u][/b][/color]

Marise has a fairly small business in a relatively poor city, so she can't afford the more expensive exotic fruits.  However she does have an ample supply of local fruit and smaller quantities of imported fruit

[color=#6fa8dc][b][u]Carlotta Valentia (Whiterun)[/u][/b][/color]

Whiterun is a central trade hub, so Carlotta has access to plenty of local and imported fruit.  She also sells smaller quantities of exotic fruit
[color=#6fa8dc]
[b][u]Jala (Solitude)[/u][/b][/color]

Solitude is a wealthy city with plenty of trade and so Jala has an ample supply of local, imported and exotic fruit for sale.

[color=#6fa8dc][b][u]Khajiit Caravans[/u][/b][/color]

The Khajiit caravans have connections in far off provinces and specialize in large quantities of exotic fruit.

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Installation / Requirements[/b][/size][/color]

I would recommend using the 'Download With Manager' button.  For manual install, unpack the file and move 'RND Fruit.esp' and 'RND Fruit.bsa' into your Skyrim data folder.

[b][size=3]This mod requires 'Realistic Needs and Diseases' and will not work without it.[/size][/b]

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

This mod edits the [i]'LItemFoodInnCommon'[/i] leveled list and also edits the following vendor chests...

[i]'MerchantCaravanAChest'
'MerchantCaravanBChest'
'MerchantCaravanCChest'
'MerchantRiftenGrandPlazaMariseChest'
'MerchantSolitudeFruitJala'
'MerchantWhiterunCarlottaChest'

[/i]Any other mod that edits these items will be incompatible.  You will need to create a merged or bashed patch so that they will work together.

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Resources Used[/b][/size][/color]

Meshes and textures are taken from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28091/?]Resource extra food v2[/url]
author: Thicketford
